item.title: How I Use Obsidian
item.description: Setting up your Obsidian Vault for Personal Knowledge Management can be daunting. You start from scratch, there are 1000’s of plugins to chose from, and honestly it all becomes one big distraction from actually generating thoughts and ideas....

item.title: My process for keeping in touch with people using TickTick
How I keep my Chrome Tabs under control with "Merge All Windows" Chrome Extension
Publishing your Obsidian Vault Online
item.description: Obsidian Blog So you’re thinking about publishing your Obsidian Vault online, but you’re not sure if you want to pay for Obsidian Publish or not. I’ve been there, that was the exact same situation I was in when I considered publishing my vault....

item.title: Vimium is not just for Developers
item.description: Chrome Extensions This video is by no means an exhaustive list of everything Vimium can do, but I can walk you through the features I use everyday that I think are a good starting point and then you can decide if you want to mix in anything else....

item.title: 5 Tips for using your mouse less on MacOS
item.description: Hey guys in today’s video I will walk you through my favorite tips for using your mouse less and your keyboard more. If you’re new to the channel, my name is Brandon and I’m a engineer & product designer....

item.title: How I use TickTick 2021
item.description: Don’t play “catch and release” with your thoughts. Your ideas have value, but tend to arrive when you least expect them. By making it a habit to “capture” and save them, you can allow them to live forever in a trusted system that reflects your goals and interests....

item.title: Save Chrome Tab Groups with Tabox
item.description: Tabox What is it Tabox is a better version of Tab Groups for Chrome I think they support Edge as well (but I don’t use Edge) It solves for me the problem of needing to keep a set of tabs around forever because I’m not done with it yet Perhaps I was configuring a new Care Plan at Work, but then I had to run to a meeting....

item.title: Faster Quick Capture & Dictation for TickTick (iOS)
item.description: I started using TickTick in march of this year after finding that time blocking in Things 3 + Fantastical to have a number of issues (perhaps I will do more on that in a future video)....

item.title: Setting up a new Mac
item.description: MacOS When Possible Start from a fresh install Log in to iCloud Install Chrome Alfred Obsidian ShiftIt (Amethyst) aText Skitch Rocket 1Password HandMirror Karabiner Elements Set Karabiner Elements Profile TickTick / Things 3 Fantastical For Development...
